name: Jefflr
tagline: Some super serious tools for the complete #jefflr experience.
body:
# Projects

Here's what's inside:

* [Bookmarklet](https://github.com/therealtakeshi/jefflr/tree/master/bookmarklet)

* [IRCbot with 2-way Mixlr chat](https://github.com/therealtakeshi/jefflr/tree/master/mixirc)

* [Stream Ripper](https://github.com/therealtakeshi/jefflr/tree/master/pymixlr)

* [Chrome Extension](https://github.com/therealtakeshi/jefflr/tree/master/bookmarklet)

___

## License

Our original code (i.e. not dependencies/libraries) is released under the MIT license, so take it and go nuts!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
